body: @GhosstFacee We'll see, I do love Ryoh-zoh's art, but I also have a couple other Hentais in mind that I'd like to commission someone to translate. Another of Ryoh-Zoh's works, "Love to Like EZR," is one of em.
@xevry Thank you so much for translating this, i hope you will continue it until the very end. I know it's too much to ask but i also hope you will translate ryoh-zoh's other work called "Rarefure"

From here on, the story will turn into something horrendous. I have read all the raws available. And the story turns into comedy/parody. Every character starts to cheat. Even the the boy friend lmao honestly you dont mind the story anymore. Just simply jerk to it and everything is good!
*sigh* I don't get the appeal of cuckery.

@Keepitquiet: Well something like that, as far as I watched the guy going to let other guy watch as they have sex, then let another one to get a blowjob from her, then sex with another one, then girl have sex while guy isn't in present, but the guy kinda planned that encounter from the start, then a swinging scene with the other girl. So it's probably gonna end in there.
